#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	    int n,q;
	    long long int a,b,c,d;
	    cin>>a>>b;
	    cin>>q;
	    bool ans=true;
	    while(q--){
	        cin>>c>>d;
	        if((c>a&&c<b)||(d>a&&d<b))
	            ans=false;
	       else if(c<=a&&d>=b)
	            ans=false;
	    }
	    if(ans)  cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	       else cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
